programme.title: Seasons of the Sierra - Ambient Nature Film
programme.desc: Experience the spectacular seasons of the Sierra Mountains in this 3 hour film. From vast swaths of colorful aspens to sparkling wildflower meadows, the "Seasons of the Sierra" showcases the stunning beauty of the Range of Light.

programme.title: Matted Art Display
programme.desc: Enjoy a series of 15 of Elizabeth Carmels Fine Art Photographs matted like framed art pieces. Each photograph is displayed for 10 minutes. To remain on one photograph press pause, follow the directions in our video "Displaying Fine Art Photographs on Your Apple TV and Roku.

programme.title: Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks
programme.desc: This lush, cinematic journey immerses you in the majesty of Kings Canyon and Sequoia National Parks, where ancient Sequoia giants tower overhead, their massive trunks bathed in dappled light. Gentle rivers meander through verdant forests, leading to serene waterfalls whose soft cascades offer a soothing, meditative ambiance. The crisp, snowy high‑Sierra peaks in the distance add a stunning alpine contrast that evokes calm and wonder. Altogether, the film crafts a tranquil escape into natures beauty—perfect for relaxation, reflection, or simply drifting off into nature’s embrace. This 90 minute film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: S2BestofBallroomBoxing
programme.desc: Dana Rucker vs Darnell Wilson

programme.title: Ballroom Boxing
programme.desc: John Terry vs Michael Dickerson and more

programme.title: Ballroom Boxing
programme.desc: James McCallister vs Jameel Wilson and more

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: Amber Rose vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E5 it true that Kanye West was harassing Amber Rose when she suddenly left him? When Kanye West started dating Amber Rose, he took her from the life of being a stripper to the global superstar world. At first, they seemed like a couple that was truly in love. But when Amber suddenly left Kanye, his attitude towards her completely changed. Our team uncovered the real story behind the tabloids of the years of bullying, unwanted media attention, and attacks that Amber had to suffer. The true story will reveal why she was the special woman Kanye fell in love with in the first place, and what she and Kim Kardashian have in common.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: The Kardashians vs. Jordyn Woods
programme.desc: S1:E4 Jordyn Woods was somebody the Kardashian family trusted. But all that changed when rumours of her being a home wrecker emerged after a scandalous yet confusing night at a party with Khloé Kardashian’s then-boyfriend and NBA player, Tristan Thompson. Our team investigated both sides of the story and got the real truth about what happened that night.

programme.title: Cameron Vs. Justin & Jessica
programme.desc: S1:E13 Cameron Diaz was one of the biggest stars in the world. So why did she leave it all behind? Our team uncovers a link between Cameron’s explosive breakup with Justin Timberlake and her choice to leave acting behind. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Cameron?Justin sparked cheating rumors when he moved on from Cameron 4 days later with Jessica Biel. Our team gets to the truth behind those rumors to reveal the role Justin played in Cameron disappearing and the truth is even more shocking…

programme.title: Oprah: Prison Of the Past
programme.desc: This one important person in Oprah Winfreys life wanted nothing to do with her until she was famous. Years later, Oprah is forced to confront her. Before you live a life of regret, listen to Oprah’s story

programme.title: Ultimate Freedom March: Remembering John Lewis
programme.desc: This short documentary is a tribute to the memory of civil rights leader John Lewis, his relationship with Martin Luther King Jr. and the courage he showed in fighting for an ideal, for freedom, democracy and justice. There is a moment in everyones life when our hearts are pounding and we are inspired and motivated to be the hero of our story. Step forward and go for what you believe in.

programme.title: Escaping North Korea: The Search for Freedom
programme.desc: Yeonmi Park was deprived of her childhood and forced to grow up far too quickly in horrifying circumstances under the tyrannical regime of KIM JONG-UN. When she was smuggled out of North Korea she hoped to find freedom and a better life, but things only got worse. This is her story.

programme.title: Simone Biles: Surviving To Soar
programme.desc: Ultimate gymnastics champion Simone Biles was at the top of her sport and defying gravity at the Tokyo 2021 Olympics. Everyone expected her to win, but every athlete has a breaking point… The Team USA superstar finally opens up about her mental health, the strict pressures of the sports industry and the DISTURBING secret involving Dr. Larry Nassar that she hid for years. Find out what REALLY happened to Simone Biles.

programme.title: Aron Ralston: The True Story Behind 127 Hours
programme.desc: Pinned down by a rock in a desert canyon miles away from civilization, Aron Ralston spent days trapped, thinking he was going to die. But something happened that changed his outlook and gave him the determination to fight for his life.

programme.title: Katie Beers: The Girl In The Wall
programme.desc: Spaceplex is 9 year old Katie Beers’ favorite spot, before she’s abducted at that same location in December 1992, just before her birthday. For 17 days, the investigators dig into the family’s lies, each more suspicious than the next, hoping to find the lost girl. Katie is trapped in the wall, but she still has her wits, which will eventually lead to justice against her kidnappers.

programme.title: The Dark Past Of Funny Man Tyler Perry
programme.desc: Tyler Perry stepped into the limelight with his character, Madea. He played a hilarious, tough-love woman who shared countless lessons on self-esteem, respecting yourself, and staying strong. Behind the scenes though, Tyler lived a life of bitterness and rage. There was one person he couldn’t forgive and it nearly cost him everything.

programme.title: Dr. Edith Edgar: Dancing with the Devil
programme.desc: Holocaust survivor Edith Eger breaks her silence on her terrifying experience as a teenager at Auschwitz. Learn how she reclaimed her story and found her voice.

programme.title: Terry Crews: My Biggest Regret
programme.desc: For years Terry Crews was terrified of his alcoholic father. Decades later, Terry finally confronts him about his childhood. But why does it become his biggest regret?

programme.title: Find Your Way Back
programme.desc: Lisa Nichols delivers a powerful speech on how she struggled with abuse and depression and what these experiences taught her, and shares the best actionable advice on how to overcome even your most troubling times.

programme.title: Jordan Peterson: A Life of Conflict
programme.desc: Its been years since Jordan Peterson caught the internet by storm. Clinical ﻿psychologist, viral YouTube personality, Canadian professor, and author, he is equally loved and despised by many. In an exclusive Goalcast interview, Dr. Peterson finally reveals the tragedy surrounding his romantic life. This video will inspire you to lift others up when they face hardship. There is strength in helping and being of service to others. When your loved ones succeed, it is equally your success!﻿

WEMTB
programme.desc: WEMTB is a 30 minutes Mountain Bike project filmed in Spain and 2 islands, Tenerife and Ibiza, with top Spanish riders such as Toni Ferreiro, Bernat Guardia, Edgar Carballo, Gabriel Torralba, Iago Garay and many more. Including sisters, brothers, father and son, a wolf dog and Pablo Alonso pedalling against Parkinson´s disease. Nature, family, self improvement and beautiful trails. Filmed and produced by Dirtyflows in 2018 and 2019.

programme.title: Kayaking the 'Canadian Amazon'
programme.desc: Big Creek in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County is commonly referred to as ‘the Canadian Amazon’ as it winds its way through thick forest, while presenting paddlers with a natural obstacle course of fallen trees. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores this ecological wonder from the seat of his kayak.

programme.title: Paddling Opemican National Park
programme.desc: With more than 20,000 lakes and rivers and endless pristine wilderness, the Abitibi-Témiscamingue region in Southwestern Québec is a paddler's paradise.

programme.title: Kayaking in the Laurentian Mountains
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he heads to the adventure-filled region of Québec that gets its' name from a chain of mountains the runs through it—the Laurentians. Join Ken as he explores the islands of Lac Poisson Blanc by sea kayak before putting his whitewater kayaking skills to the test on one of Eastern Canada's most popular rivers, the Rouge River.

programme.title: Ocean Valour: Salcombe - New York HD
programme.desc: On 3rd May 2015, Tom Rainey and Lawrence Walters set out from Manhattan, New York to row 4,100 miles unsupported across the North Atlantic Ocean.

programme.title: Chile
programme.desc: Tag along as Teton Gravity Research takes pipe-jock snowboarders Pat Moore and Danny Davis to southern Chile to test their skills off-piste. The team explores the Termas de Chillan resort, and uses snowmobiles to access the vast Chilean alpine.

programme.title: Haines HD
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research team in Haines, Alaska. Victoria Jealouse hits spines, Sage Cattabriga-Alosa gets the line of his life, and Erik Roner falls hundreds of feet.

programme.title: Paddling the Saint Laurence River
programme.desc: Known for its spectacular St. Lawrence coastline and rugged wilderness, Bas-Saint-Laurent, Québec is an outdoor lover's dream. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores the region by sea kayak in Bic National Park, before hopping in a canoe to see bald eagles up close and personal in Lake Témiscouata National Park.

programme.title: The Mentor
programme.desc: Professional climber Marcus Garcia travels from his home in southwest Colorado’s San Juan Mountains to the limestone cliffs and spires of El Potrero Chico in northern Mexico to revisit his mentor’s final climb. In an emotional and powerful act of closure, he reflects on the accident that took him a decade to talk about—and climbs the route that took his mentor’s life.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking Québec's North Shore
programme.desc: Côte-Nord, Québec is a seemingly boundless area that's known for its rugged beauty and diversity of its wildlife. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he goes sea kayaking with puffins and monoliths in Mingan Archipelago National Park Reserve, as well as stand up paddles and whitewater kayaks one of the many rivers that drops into the Gulf of the Saint Lawrence River.

programme.title: Ice Edge
programme.desc: Ice Edge is a short documentary about a group of surfers trying to make surfboards out of ice. It follows the process from freezing the boards, shaping them and taking them out into the sea. There is a lot of trying and failing. Will it work at all? The boards are slippery, and they melt very fast. Everything needs to work simultaneously: The surfers must be ready. The boards cannot crack. The perfect wave must come. Ice Edge is a film where nature and people play together.

programme.title: Jackson Hole HD
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew as they rip around Jackson Hole Mountain Resort and surrounding backcountry during the filming of TGR's Tangerine Dream.

programme.title: Backpacking Uganda Part 1
programme.desc: Showcasing the people, places and adventures that surround the world’s top backpacking trails, Epic Trails is an exciting and inspiring adventure travel series hosted by Eric Hanson. An avid backpacker, knowledgeable wilderness explorer and passionate adventurer, Eric has a strong presence in the online backpacking community and shares his adventures in an approachable and inspirational way.

programme.title: British Mini Bikes
programme.desc: British Mini Bikes has grown into Britains biggest and best championship for racing all forms of Mini bikes on tarmac surfaces.

programme.title: FIM X-Trial
programme.desc: The top seven in the Standings return to contest the second part of a French back-to-back as the series makes its return Nice.

programme.title: Sams Garage
programme.desc: The guys use a Trail Rocker system to mock up the Jeep Wrangler projects wiring harness, and try to finish the LS3 engine build.

programme.title: Lokar Car Show

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: It's back to the runway with Carwow, this time it's a BMW M1000RR vs a 1000bhp BMW M4 Competition. Chad's been to Spain for the launch of the brand new Suzuki GSX-8R, morning on the road and afternoon on the Monteblanco track.

programme.title: Garden Party
programme.desc: Ready to dig in and grow your green thumb? Join us for a delightful hour of expert-led gardening tutorials designed to inspire and educate gardeners of all levels. From essential planting tips and soil secrets to creative container gardening and vibrant floral arrangements, our seasoned instructors will guide you through every step. Whether you're a seasoned horticulturist or just starting out, you'll find fresh ideas and practical techniques to cultivate the garden of your dreams.

programme.desc: When territory is opened for settlement, Ralph and Mary plan to claim some land Mary's father had discovered. When crooks, aware of the land value, beat Ralph, Annie and Lofty decide to stake a claim for the couple. Original Air Date: 5/22/1955.

programme.title: Wot A Night (1931)
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tom and Jerry, two ambitious cab drivers, wait outside a train station for fares. When two strange men in top hats disembark from their train, the hacks solicit them until they give in and ask for a ride to their castle. When the men stiff the fare, Tom and Jerry pursue them, only to be trapped inside the castle by a portcullis. They wander about the residence and encounter a fearsome-looking bat, a bathing, whistling skeleton, a veritable army of ghosts, and other assorted ghouls and goblins. After meeting a skeletal quartet in black-face, they find the two strange men again and discover they've been turned into skeletons as well, after which they escape the castle and run for their lives.

programme.title: HANGMAN
programme.desc: Two Iraq war vets Nick and Lenny return to the hometown of their ex girlfriends to see if they can rekindle the flames. What should be a little R&R in the woods slowly turns into Murder & Mayhem, when they take off with the girls to an abandoned cabin on their closed Alma Mater campus. There they fall prey to a deadly game of Hangman. This one comes complete with a real noose for the losers. Lust soon gives way to suspicion and fear as they turn on each other to survive. Only the Hangman knows who will win this game

programme.title: SKIN BUSINESS
programme.desc: THE SKIN BUSINESS is a movie about how the Internet has cut into the profits of what was once thought to be a recession-proof business, and how directors and producers are gambling on a newly- popular genre of porn: the porn parody. This film shows how the industry takes on some of entertainments most popular franchises and makes them xxx; from Batman, to the Addams Family, to the Brady Bunch and even animated features like American Dad, there is nothing in mainstream that cant be made fun of in porn. If you love porn, you will love this movie. If you are a virgin to the world of porn, consider this Porn 101.

programme.title: BLACK COAT MOB
programme.desc: Reed contemplates revenge against Pams acquitted killer, while sweet memories of their love challenge him to make a choice; love or hate, malice or forgiveness, revenge or redemption.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 26
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 15
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Cat and Keet Went up Hill
programme.desc: GrandPA has taken the trio for a small holiday in the high hills. Its very cold and surrounded by snow. t

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: AAAAAACCCCHAAAAAIIIIIII
programme.desc: Its a terrible day for Sundar who has caught cold and is on sneeze marathon. Customers are getting bothered. Chai Raja warns him, one more sneeze and he will be thrown out. Well, the day turns into a nightmare for Sundar as Basha does every insane thing to make him sneeze. Gradually, the control becomes uncontrollable to an extent that Sundar lets out a massive sneeze blowing of the entire tea stall.

programme.title: Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Trash Planet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Mouse Chase
programme.desc: A small mouse is very scared and just escaped from Hoodie and his gang to now hide in the house. Well from the pan into the fire as he realizes that Cat is worst then Hoodie.

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: CHARMED, I SAY
programme.desc: Sundar is flipping through old film magazines in his break time when he hears a shriek from right outside the tea shop. Leaning out he sees a woman point at something just at the door. Chai Raja swoops out and in a deft move ensnares whatever it was in a rat-trap. He hands over the small harmless trap to Sundar. Sundar takes the trap and opens it only to find a small benign rattlesnake (female at that!) glide out. The female snake has a fixation on Sundar and follows him back to the hotel, causing havoc in the hotel. For once Sundar has an ally against Basha, but the obsessive snake is more a bane than a boon as Chai Raja is in danger of losing all its customers. Sundar must now tactfully rid the simpering snake off before he too is forced to slither out of the tea shop once and for all.

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: GONE WITH THE CHAI!
programme.desc: Its a very windy day and Sundar is having a tough time as Chai Raja sends him running in all directions- sometimes to throw more coconut fronds onto the rapidly diminishing roof, at other times to keep an especially thin customer from flying off! Basha only adds to his woes as Basha deliberately keeps undoing all that Sundar does just so that the poor waiter of Hotel California stays distracted enough and cant chase the bothersome Basha off the premises. Sundar tries tacking a tarpaulin sheet but Basha naughtily shifts it to the entrance where the tarpaulin sheet takes on a mind of its own and customers find themselves ushered/plonked into the shop in unorthodox manners. Sundar runs to take it down and is also caught up by the stormy tarpaulin sheet. Finally, Sundar has it stuffed into the closet but then he finds that the wind has weakened one of the wooden posts and the roof may fall any second on the tea-sippers. Sundar tries his own (bad) handyman skills and drill nails to hold up the post, but Bashas interference leads to the post crumbling entirely. Desperate, Sundar stands in place of the post, holding the roof up- Basha tickles & taunts Sundar and has a gala time. But the loyal Sundar sticks through it. Suddenly the storm seems to die and Sundar gingerly steps out of the spot- and quickly sticks in a pipe to hold up the roof it seems to be holding!! Relieved, he dashes to where Chai Raja has set out his supper and casually flicks a tiny baby coconut that had fallen in it aside...but this ricochets off the many already shaken up posts of the stall and in a trice the three posts of the stall are knocked down. The pipe creaks...then bends and as Sundar gulps, the last support of the roof too gives away and it comes crashing down! In the distance Basha chuckles and tucks in for the night.

programme.title: Pineapple Rain
programme.desc: When Nardys pizza propagating machine goes awry, he tosses it out the window and into the hands of Biggs who turns it into an extreme weather making machine. Can Nardy and the other Smighties stop it in time?

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Dunky's Laundry
programme.desc: GrandPa has entrusted Dunky to get his special Yellow shirt washed and ironed ready. Meanwhile a funny sequence of events and chase is happening between Cat and Keet.

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: MARDANA MURGA
programme.desc: Not too far from the Hotel California, a muscular six-pack rooster escapes from a chicken truck and to everyone surprise he loves Chai Rajas Banana Fries. Sundar decides to use him against Basha. Now Basha has to outwit the duo and get the rooster back into that chicken truck.

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: GOOD CROC, BAD CROC!
programme.desc: The Guardians enjoy a baby croc until it grows into an unmanageable mutant sent by Negu. They’ll need to train the croc, and then return it to the island Negu stole it from.

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: Trolly Troll arrives in Smightyland, but her big size scares everyone except Leila. Leila befriends the gentle giant and when Sneevil creates his Mecha-Sneevil Machine and tries to destroy everything, its Trolly Trolls bigness that helps save the day.

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: The Low Price of Fame
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: Harvest Attack
programme.desc: Its harvest time and Dunky has given Cat the duty of protecting the fields with a sling and pebbles and Keet is to give him warnings if Hoodie the crow attacks the field with his gang

programme.title: FRUITFUL MULTIPLICATION
programme.desc: Four green Fruit Ninjas find their first real-life enemy in the form of an ancient ninja with a score to settle.

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Gummy.
programme.desc: A weird gizmo in Granny Peters’ lab winds up shrinking Gummy down to a tiny size, and he must cope with a suddenly-HUGE world... while trying to contact pals Harry and Kala and figure out some way to get back to normal.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: Paper Cups
programme.desc: What could our DIY make with a paper cup? Lets find out

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Too Many Bubbles
programme.desc: When Pancake eats too many bubbles from the Bubble Pond, he becomes super bouncy. Too much of anything isnt good.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Burping Boulders
programme.desc: Afraid of the loud thunder in the waking world, Maple discovers in the Zooniverse that Ene fears something too - the mysterious and loud burping boulders. Together they go on a journey to face their fears - and find fun along the way. With persistence you can overcome your fears… and sharing your feelings is the start of a solution

programme.title: Mini Fix
programme.desc: Colonel is building a HUGE MINIATURE city out of LEGO-like blocks. There are trees and roads and houses with windows and tall buildings and a hospital and a police station and prison and pools. Now what could go wrong here???

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: The Rolling Rice Ball
programme.desc: WI-Go drops one of his rice balls in a rat hole and gets a handful of jewelry in return. Meanwhile, a greedy neighbor next door UGo hears the news.

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: Thunderstorm
programme.desc: The twins help a girl to overcome her fear of thunderstorms.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Super Gummy
programme.desc: Accidentally convinced that he’s a super hero, Gummy becomes Mind-O-Man – and sets out to help out everybody... to the point of driving them CRAZY!

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Stitch in Time
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Robo-Gummy
programme.desc: Finding himself over-committed to too many things, Gummy orders a few duplicate robots of himself... who winds up in the end causing more trouble than they’re worth!

programme.title: Carrotade
programme.desc: Fred Dad Simon is excited about his new invention, a disgusting drink with “the power of 500 carrots!” Fred fakes drinking it, and commands Friday into a phony weight-lifting machine, which convinces kids at school that the drink works. Instead, the drink turns kids skin orange, making them very appetizing to Brains’ latest foe, the Carniverous Carniborgs!

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: Giant Love – Little Brave Tailor
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, the elf FO, travel into the story of the Brave Little Tailor by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by the KING in that story. Some time ago, the TAILOR set out to finish off the two GIANTS that are terrorising the kingdom, and he has still not come back. SANDRA and FO go to the GIANTS’ lair and discover that the LITTLE TAILOR has been taken prisoner by them. So far, the LITTLE TAILOR has managed to save his skin by offering to make two enormous suits for his captors. But the day these suits are finished, they will devour him. SANDRA and FO manage to rescue the LITTLE TAILOR, promising the GIANTS the thing they most want: a girlfriend each, two charming giantesses, to keep them company.

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: Shhh~ It`s a Secret
programme.desc: The gang is exploring the flowers, but Duda wants to explore something more exciting. He learns about Wibbly-Wobbly Cliff and becomes animated with interest. Unfortunately, Dada tells him not to go there alone because its dangerous. Despite Dadas warnings, Duda persuades Caber to go to the cliff with him. They discover a treasure in a cave but are afraid to upset Dada and promise to keep their find a secret from each other. Duda has a hard time keeping his secret and accidentally lets it slip to Piggy, Puggy and Bubble. Soon, everyone puts the pieces together and goes to find Duda and Caber. Meanwhile, Duda and Caber are in the treasure cave playing with their treasure. However, instead of having fun they seem a little sad...

programme.title: The Dung Beatle
programme.desc: To make herself more likable to the other girls at school, Fred arranges for Braianna to throw a “Pet Party,” with Friday posing as her doggy.

programme.title: Sideways Day
programme.desc: Odessa learns to accept Pancake’s idea over her own when she joins the Zoonicorns in Sideways Day.Accepting other’s ideas even if they’re different from your own.

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: I want To be Sick
programme.desc: Cabers sneezes are reverberating throughout the Unknown Forest. Poor Caber has a terrible cold. But instead of feeling bad for him, Duda is jealous of all the attention Caber gets from Dada. To make matters worse, he ends up eating all the raspberries that Dada was going to give Caber for his cold. Meanwhile, when Scot learns of Pinkars transformation into a mobile hospital, he pretends to be sick to get on Pinkar and finally drive him. Feeling bad about eating all the raspberries, Duda suggests going on a raspberry expedition. Unfortunately, they encounter a roadblock. Duda, wanting to help his friends get better, volunteers to go searching on his own. However, as soon as he leaves, it starts to thunder and rain. Will Duda be okay? And can he get the raspberries without eating them himself?

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: El segundo aire
programme.desc: Elena despierta con las manos cubiertas de sangre y su casa en llamas. Ella no puede recordar nada

programme.title: La ciega vidente
programme.desc: Víctor está enamorado de la novia de su hijo y decide acudir a la ciega vidente para resolver la situación.

programme.title: Primero el amor
programme.desc: Para salvar el restaurante de su padre, Olivia debe colaborar con un famoso chef que su padre contrató.

programme.title: Bailamos
programme.desc: Muere la prometida de Kaden, el no lo sabe. Su madre contrata a Ayla para que se haga pasar por Evangelina.

programme.title: Bailamos
programme.desc: Muere la prometida de Kaden, el no lo sabe. Su madre contrata a Ayla para que se haga pasar por Evangelina.

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Parlez Vous Woo 1956
programme.desc: Olive is so captived by "The International", a radio personality with a French accent, that she'd rather stay home than go out on a date with Popeye. Bluto, overhearing this, comes to the door as the character. Popeye does his best to get Olive back, to no avail. Finally, Bluto challenges Popeye to a duel, ultimately stabbing him in the chest where his can of spinach was. Popeye unmasks Bluto, then eats another can of spinach to give himself a French accent.

programme.title: Betty Boop- The Scared Crows 1939

programme.title: Often an Orphan 1949

programme.title: The Crystal Brawl 1957
programme.desc: Bluto muscles out Popeye to take Olive to the fair. Popeye rushes ahead and poses as a fortune teller, luring Olive in. He shows Olive her future (actually, her past) in the crystal ball: first, a clip of a mountain climbing sequence that culminates in Bluto assaulting Olive. Then, a clip from another amusement park showing strongman Bluto stealing Olive away to a roller-coaster while Popeye rings a strength-testing bell repeatedly. Olive, having seen this, no longer wants anything to do with Bluto and walks out. Bluto exposes Popeye and chases Olive into a Tunnel of Love; Popeye follows and trashes Bluto.

programme.desc: A group of young space cadets use a technologically advanced mecha to combat an evil extraterrestrial race that is trying to take over the galaxy

programme.title: I Don't Scare 1956
programme.desc: Popeye has beaten Bluto to a date with Olive. Seeing that Olive is superstitious, Bluto changes the date to Friday the 13th, and proceeds to rig various proofs that bad things will happen if she goes out.

programme.title: Jungle Drums 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple.

programme.title: Jungle Drums- 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple

programme.title: Felix Gets Broadcasted-1923
programme.desc: Felix spots a fisherman on his way to his fishing spot, and figures he can follow the guy and grab a quick lunch by stealing his catch. Although he successfully nabs a few fish, the angler catches on and finally captures Felix. To get his revenge, he sends Felix through the telephone wires ("broadcasted") to Egypt, and Felix finds out that the Egyptians don't want him there, either.

programme.title: The Trojan Horse 1960
programme.desc: During the Trojan War, the Greeks build a giant wooden horse as a stratagem to conquer the city of Troy. Adapted from the Greek myth.

programme.title: Taxi Turvy 1945

programme.title: Cad and Caddy- 1947

programme.title: Much ado About Nutting 1953
programme.desc: A squirrel in a downtown park lugs a giant coconut back home, but nothing he does can seem to crack it open.

programme.title: A Haunting we Will Go 1949
programme.desc: Casper the Friendly Ghost, sad that he can make no friends since everyone he meets is afraid of him, hatches an abandoned egg and becomes the emerging little duck's best friend and protector.

programme.title: Felix the Cat - Felix in Holly wood -1923
Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: Spooking About Africa 1957
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command.

programme.title: My Favorite Brunette 1947
programme.desc: Shortly before his execution on the death row in San Quentin, amateur sleuth and baby photographer Ronnie Jackson, tells reporters how he got there

programme.title: The Tree in a Test Tube 1942
programme.desc: Laurel and Hardy demonstrate the uses of wood in this World War II propaganda film

programme.title: Misbehaving Husbands 1940
programme.desc: The owner of a department store is threatened with divorce by his wife, who has gotten reports that he's been seen in the arms of a beautiful blonde on the night of their 20th wedding anniversary. He has to find a way to convince her that the "beautiful blonde" in question was actually a store mannequin that he was taking in for repairs

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963; Season 3; Episode 19;Class Reunion
programme.desc: At his high school class reunion, Andy finds that, while memories may fade over time, some connections are never completely broken, and some hearts never completely heal

programme.title: Among Us UFO Witnesses And Whistleblowers
Guest Shaun T
programme.desc: Shaun T is an amazing fitness trainer — the man behind Insanity — and he’s had a fascinating life. He goes deep into how he was sexually abused throughout his youth and how he’s become an inspiration to others and what you really should be doing to get the best workout you can.

programme.title: Guest Rachel Maddow
programme.desc: Rachel Maddow is an MSNBC legend and an old friend and the author of a book called Prequel. We talk about what’s going on in America and also dive into Rachel’s life.

programme.title: Guest Eric Benet
programme.desc: Eric Benet has been a friend for a long time but we’ve never really sat down and discussed his whole story. How did he get from Milwaukee to Hollywood? He’s a great storyteller so we run through how he discovered that he’s good looking, how he learned how to sing, how he pulled Halle Berry, and more. He’s a lot of fun to hang with.

programme.title: Guest Lagueria Davis
programme.desc: Tanya Hart speaks with actors, recording artists, and creatives in the entertainment industry.

programme.title: Guests Elo Copeland, Kelz, Ashli Gibbs
programme.desc: Contestants answer trivia questions about Aquarius celebrities, trending news, music, and Black History & Culture to win cash prizes.

programme.title: Life-extending, Anti-Aging Talk
programme.desc: NY Times bestselling author Dr. Michael Greger reveals... How Not to Age. Wouldn't you like to know?

programme.title: Veggie Coconut Curry!
programme.desc: One Great Vegan Gabrielle Reyes makes a coconut curry dish that's so delish, you'll want to sing!

programme.title: Kale Krew's NYC's Spicy Moon
programme.desc: Spicy Moon is the hottest spot in NYC's hippest hood: The Bowery. Come join the party &eat with us

programme.title: Kale Krew - Vegan Pizza
programme.desc: My Pie makes a mouthwatering, vegan, deep dish pizza that's classic Chicago!

programme.title: Plant Based in the Burbs - Fried Shroom"Chick-Un"
programme.desc: Shroom it and get a "chick-un" dish that tastes like your favorite crispy, fried chicken.

programme.title: Plant Based in the Burbs - Sherri & Paige Do the Poke Bowl
programme.desc: Poke bowls often involve an animal protein. But, here's a vegan poke bowl that you will love!

programme.title: Plant Based in the Burbs - Walnut Lettuce Tacos
programme.desc: Sherri Johnson & Paige Parsons Roache make scrumptious Raw Walnut Tacos on Plant-Based in the Burbs!

programme.title: Optimize Your Gut Microbiome!
programme.desc: The Doctor Moms are here to reveal the top 5 Ways to Optimize Your Gut Microbiome for health & mood!

programme.title: Climb Every Mountain
programme.desc: Rock climber and adventurer Steph Davis shares the secret of the food powering her amazing feats!

programme.title: What the Heck is a Nama Juicer?
programme.desc: The Spicy Vegans reveal their secret weapon to ultimate health.

programme.title: Not a Nugget
programme.desc: This short film about a rescued chicken will make you smile and make you rethink chicken nuggets.

programme.title: Groatnola? It's Delish, Really!
programme.desc: NY Times bestselling author Dr Greger delivers a breakfast recipe that will blow your mind!

programme.title: Ahimsa & Environment: Making Peace with Nature
programme.desc: Watch Ahimsa & the Environment and learn how you can be the change you wish to see in the world.

programme.title: Susan Pratt Reveals Cactus Magic!
programme.desc: How to make Cactus Soy Curls, inspired by Ave's chic cactus bag

programme.title: The Elevator (ITN)
programme.desc: A reporter discovers all is not as it seems at an infamous hotel...

programme.title: Horror High 2020 Tyler J. Case
programme.desc: A monster lurks around a high school in the hypnotized town of Willow Hills and picks off tardy students one by one. Now it is up to an unlikely group of teens to put an end to the terror that has plagued many...

programme.title: Lake Terror
programme.desc: Remington has escaped the evil cabin but now the evil continues to follow him, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Meanwhile, Chloe and Revel look for a missing sister that went to the evil cabin in the previous installment. The two meet Vincent, a failing TV host, to help psychically contact the missing sister. That's when a gunshot rings out in the night and the three meet Remington. Now they all must battle for their lives against the evil that pursues Remington to once and for all lock the evil away for good...

programme.title: Jack and Jill: The Hills of Hell
programme.desc: After searching for her missing daughter, a lady and her search party discover the legend behind the murderous pair of Jack and Jill...

programme.title: La Feria del Diablo
programme.desc: Protagonizada por Justin Duncan, Gerald Crum, Mercedes Peterson y John Charles Dickson. Las estrellas de dos series de televisión paranormales, rivales y enfrentadas, convergen en un parque de atracciones embrujado y abandonado que termina siendo el epicentro del infierno. Ahora están todos atrapados en una guerra sin cuartel contra el mal puro...

programme.title: Naufragio
programme.desc: Mientras transportaba un paquete importante, una joven sufre un accidente de coche en medio de la nada, dejándola atrapada debajo del coche. Poco a poco, se da cuenta de que no solo unos hombres muy malvados la persiguen para recuperar el objeto que transporta, sino que algo muy peligroso la acecha desde las profundidades del bosque...

programme.title: El Juego del Duende
programme.desc: Después de que un hombre adinerado envía a un grupo de ladrones a buscar leyendas urbanas con la intención de abrir un museo lleno de criaturas míticas, pronto descubrirán la leyenda de un duende...

programme.title: Brindis Mortal
programme.desc: te presentamos la historia de Ramon, el hijo de un poderoso narcotraficante quien anhela convertirse en la mano derecha de su padre y formar parte de su grupo de sicarios. Pero su padre aun no lo considera listo para el trabajo y le da largas. lo cual desespera a Ramon y lo lleva a tomar decisiones que cambiaran para siempre la relación entre padre e hijo.

programme.title: Amor Interés y Muerte
programme.desc: La ambición es la causa por la que unos padres obligan a su hija menor a casarse con un hombre de 50 años para asegurar un futuro lleno de comodidades, sin embargo no contaban con que las cosas no saldrían como lo tenían planeado.

programme.title: Catemaco: Magia y Misterio
programme.desc: Una familia normal va de vacaciones a Catemaco, Michoacan un pueblo famoso y pintoresco en Mexico. Todo marcha bien hasta que son atacados por criminales, el padre sobrevive, y con ayuda del brujo mayor del pueblo cobra venganza.

programme.title: Al Acecho del Leopardo AKA Madrid- México
programme.desc: Durante un viaje por la selva mexicana, tres amigos, Román, Patricia y Lorena son testigos de una matanza de campesinos indígenas. Román graba en vídeo la masacre. El Suavecito, el jefe de los asesinos, se da cuenta y mata a Román y a Patricia. Aprovechando la confusión del tiroteo, Lorena logra escapar con la cámara y el vídeo. En su huida se encuentra con un grupo de enanitos toreros que la llevan hasta la ciudad de México. El Suavecito, que no quiere dejar testigos, la persigue implacablemente hasta una enorme plaza de toros, donde en una danza de la muerte, se escenificará la batalla entre el bien y el mal.

programme.title: El Sonido de los Tulipanes
programme.desc: En Buenos Aires durante la crisis del 2001, Marcelo un escritor devenido en periodista, debe volver sobre los últimos pasos de su padre Tonio un consagrado intelectual de quien se encuentra profundamente distanciado cuando muere en condiciones extrañas. De la mano de Carolina la ex secretaria de su padre, Marcelo se sumerge en un mundo oscuro lleno de violencia y ambiciones de poder enfrentándose a “El Loco” Bertolini. Pero el peligro no solo lo acechará a él sino también a los suyos. ¿Podrá Marcelo encontrar los verdaderos motivos de la muerte de su padre?

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.

programme.title: El Secreto Oculto
programme.desc: Describe los eventos del fin de los tiempos de la humanidad profetizada por místicos y Santos sobre los 3 días de oscuridad en que los demonios serán soldados ...

programme.title: Soy Una Buena Persona
programme.desc: Sabina es una treintañera muy "artista" convencida de que podrá algún día vivir de su arte como diseñadora, actriz, guionista o directora, porque ella está destinada a petarlo. Mientras, como casi toda su generación, malvive gorroneando en casa de sus padres. Pero una noche tiene, por desgracia ajena, una oportunidad de lujo... y no dudará en aprovecharla sin pensárselo demasiado.

programme.title: El Cóndor En Nueva York
programme.desc: Un narcotraficante de Nueva York, llamado Damián, ha creado una nueva droga con efectos impactantes. Después de varias muertes accidentales, la DEA y la policía se embarcan en una búsqueda inútil en busca de este jefe de la mafia. Damián comienza a derrotar a su competencia con la ayuda de su científico privado y un informante de la DEA. El hijo del alcalde Martínez (de Súper Cóndor) queda en coma tras consumir el nuevo medicamento. El alcalde Martínez vuela a Nueva York desde Perú para comenzar su propia investigación en busca de Damián y una cura. Todo parece sombrío para los agentes de la DEA, el alcalde Martínez y su hijo; hasta que llegue la ayuda. El Cóndor llega a Nueva York desde Perú para ayudar a revertir los efectos de esta nueva y brutal droga y llevar a Damián ante la justicia.
